response.overview: This is Volume 7 of Target Video's compilation video series Underground Forces.  This one has some really fascinating material for fans of obscure video art of the early 1980s.  Here is a list of the videos and performances on Volume 7:  01 ADS-Waiting For The War 02 Sex Pistols-Holiday In The Sun (Film) 03 Mekanik Destruct (Live) 04 Solidarnose (Film) 05 Exploited-Troops Of Tomorrow (Live) 06 Crucifix (Live) 07 Ch 3-He's Gotta Gun, Catholic Boy (Live) 09 Colossus-Art 10 Minimal Man-Two Little Skeletons
response.title: Target Video: Underground Forces Volume 7
